body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install llvm+cuda+omp_debug cuda_arch=60
...
```

### Information on your system
packages:
  cuda:
    externals:
    - spec: cuda@11.0.221
      prefix: /home/app/cuda/11.0

### Additional information
### General information
title: Installation issue: llvm+cuda_omp_debug cuda_arch=60
